Question 07) The use of certain linguistic varieties in educational campaigns has the function of reaching the target audience more directly and effectively. In the case of this text, this strategy is identified by the
A) Formal discourse of the Portuguese language.
B) own standard record of the written language.
C) Lexical selection restricted to the sphere of medicine.
D) Loyalty to the jargon of advertising language.
E) use of typical linguistic marks of orality.
